commit.message:
Auto merge of #13541 - Veykril:dbg-cmd, r=Veykril

Clarify what commands are debug commands in VSCode

Renders as
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/3757771/199828895-4d7691f6-5c33-405c-9842-691b32745919.png)

files.patch:
